name: Trash Seeker
description:
I am glad to present you my new game,  in which your seeker robot needs to collect space debris from the surface of the planet. Using this garbage as spare parts, you can upgrade your assistant.

Good luck! 

Use AWSD or Cursor keys for moving, 

Space for break, 

Escape key for Pause/Exit. 

Mouse for other actions.

Music and some sound effects by Eric Matyas: www.soundimage.org

Game by Dragon Mesh    https://www.facebook.com/dragonmesh    for WGJ 155.
